desc: Air-dry clay home pottery kits for adults, beginners and DIY creators. We're bringing the joy of pottery into peoples homes, without the need for a kiln. Step by step pottery starter guide included, along with paint brushes, sealant and all the pottery tools needed to create a masterpiece from home. We ship globally!

layout.text:
We’re getting clay between the fingernails of
people looking for an escape-by-making.
